Title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Brian Gunn (screenplay), Mark Gunn (screenplay), Richard Outten (story), Brian Gunn (story), Mark Gunn (story), Jules Verne (novel)
Actors: Dwayne Johnson, Michael Caine, Josh Hutcherson, Luis Guzmán
Plot: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.
